Spells:

Detect Magic (W0 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on magical auras for conc or 8 min

Fireball (W3 Evoc): R720' Inflicts 8d6 HP (DC 16 Ref half) in 20' radius
Flare (W0 Evoc): R45' Target dazzled (DC 13 Fort neg) for 1 min
Floating Disk (W1 Evoc): R45' 3'-diameter x 1 inch thick force disk follows, holds 800 lbs at 3' for 8 hr
Fly (W3 Tran): Touched gains 60' fly speed for 8 min
Invisibility Sphere (W3 Illu): Creatures in 10' radius of touched become invisible for 8 min or until attack or leave area
Lesser Globe Of Invulnerability (W4 Abju): 10' radius bars spell effects up to 3rd level for 8 rd
Locate Object (W2 Divi): Self senses direction of object or type in 720' radius for 8 min
Mirror Image (W2 Illu): Creates 1d4+2 self copies that mislead attacks for 8 min
Nondetection (W3 Abju): Touched gains SR 19 (divination) (or self gains SR 23) for 8 hr
Phantom Trap (W2 Illu): Touched object appears trapped
Read Magic (W0 Divi): Self reads magical writing for 80 min
Sleep (W1 Ench): R180' 4 HD creatures in 10' radius sleep (DC 14 Will neg) for 8 min
Magic Notes:
